117 template <class InterfaceType>
118 inline InterfaceType* CCompositeComponent::GetComponentInterface(const QByteArray& subId)
119 {
120  static istd::CClassInfo info(typeid(InterfaceType));
121 
122  return static_cast<InterfaceType*>(GetInterface(info, subId));
123 }
